data: “Her lips were silent—scarcely beat her heart, Her eyes alone proclaimed, ‘we must not part;’ Thy hope may perish, or thy friends may flee, Farewell to life, but not adieu to thee.”
Betrothed for a day: Or, Queenie Trevalyn's love test
